Package genericClass

Class CoreMethods

java.lang.Object
base.Base
genericClass.CoreMethods
public class CoreMethods extends base.Base
The CoreMethods class provides reusable utility methods for Selenium WebDriver automation. It extends the Base class and acts as a core framework component for interacting with web elements.

This class includes methods for common browser actions such as:

  • Locating elements dynamically using different selectors.
  • Navigating to a URL.
  • Interacting with input fields.
  • Clicking elements.
  • Scrolling smoothly to an element.

Note: This class requires a valid WebDriver instance for execution.

Since:
2025-02-14
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mahamudul Islam

  • Method Details

    • GetElement

      public static org.openqa.selenium.WebElement GetElement(String locator)
      Finds a web element based on the provided locator.

      The method determines the locator type dynamically:

      • XPath: If the locator starts with "//" or "(//".
      • ID: If the locator starts with "#".
      • Class Name: If the locator starts with ".".
      • CSS Selector: Default fallback.

      Parameters:
      locator - The locator string representing the web element.
      Returns:
      The WebElement found using the specified locator.

    • hitUrl

      public void hitUrl(String url)
      Navigates to the specified URL in the browser.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to navigate to.

    • insertText

      public void insertText(String locator, String inputText)
      Inserts text into an input field or text box.
      Parameters:
      locator - The locator string representing the input field.
      inputText - The text to be inserted.

    • click

      public void click(String locator)
      Clicks on a web element.
      Parameters:
      locator - The locator string representing the clickable element.

    • scrollSmooth

      public void scrollSmooth(String locator)
      Smoothly scrolls to an element, bringing it to the center of the viewport.
      Parameters:
      locator - The locator string representing the element to scroll to.
